name: 3DS Mii
summary: A CFSD file is a Mii used in a Nintendo 3DS video game. It contains an animated character that is shown in-game. Official 3DS Miis and player-created 3DS Miis are all saved as CFSD files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Not meant to be opened outside the Nintendo 3DS games in which they are used
